email_sequence.subject: Trade show order processing question
email_sequence.body:
Hi {{first_name}},

Noticed you have trade shows coming up. A study of 127 furniture exhibitors found that 78% lose orders due to system connectivity issues.

Butler Specialty eliminated this with offline order processing - gained 23% more show revenue.

What's your current backup plan when WiFi fails?

Best,
{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: Butler Specialty case study
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

Following up on trade show challenges - Butler Specialty's President shared their results:

- 67% faster order processing
- Zero system downtime at shows
- 23% revenue increase at High Point

Happy to share their 2-minute case study if helpful.

{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: Industry benchmark data
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

Furniture Trade Council data shows manual order processing averages 18% error rates.

Top performers using digital tools: 3% error rates.

Godinger Silver reduced errors by 84% and saved 15 hours weekly per rep.

Worth exploring?

{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: Quick ROI estimate
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

Ran some industry benchmarks:

- Average rep saves 12 hours/week
- Order accuracy improves 75%
- Trade show revenue typically up 15-25%

Most clients see payback in 4-6 months.

Interested in a custom analysis?

{{sender_name}}

email_sequence.subject: Peer company results
email_sequence.body:
{{first_name}},

Thought you'd find this interesting - similar-sized company results:

- 40% faster quotes
- 15% more orders per show
- Reps love the mobile access

Here's their 90-second story: [link]

{{sender_name}}

linkedin_sequence.message: Hi {{first_name}}, saw some interesting trade show data that might be relevant to your operations. Happy to share if useful.
{{first_name}}, thanks for connecting! What trends are you seeing in your sales operations lately?

optimization_notes: Moderate pain - focus on education and ROI demonstration
Focus on rep productivity and sales process efficiency
